org.deeplearning4j.parallelism

Class EarlyStoppingParallelTrainer<T extends Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.parallelism.EarlyStoppingParallelTrainer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEarlyStoppingTrainer<T>

    public class EarlyStoppingParallelTrainer<T extends Model>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEarlyStoppingTrainer<T>
    Conduct parallel early stopping training with ParallelWrapper under the hood.
    Can be used to train a MultiLayerNetwork or a ComputationGraph via early stopping.
